page.title: 16Games for Older Children.
page.content: The oldest children in the school choose two games which they liked. These are "othello" and "Monopoly". Monopoly is a board game which the players move around the edge of. The edge is split into boxes. Each box has the name of a street or station in London on it and some boxes are grouped together and are the same colour. The player moves around the board after shaking a die and can buy property if he lands on its square.If he lands on a square owned by another player he has to pay him rent. Once a player has bought a group of properties he can buy houses and hotels for it and so charge more rent. This game can last a long time and the winner is the person who has most property and money.
